directions: In a small bowl, whisk the mayonnaise, ketchup, sugar, lemon juice, paprika, and pepper together. Stir in the chives and set aside.
Arrange the watercress on individual serving plates. Place apple, avocado, hearts of palm on top. Sprinkle with walnuts and drizzle with dressing.
Evenly sprinkle dressing over salad and serve.
ingredients: 2 Granny Smith apples - peeled, cored and sliced thin
title: Apple, Avocado and Hearts of Palm Salad
